file_content.text: Disaster = averted // T4-M7 = successful
The Shroud = at large + dangerous // You = stop the Shroud
T4-M7 = maintenance routine in progress...
Identity = recognized // Message recipient = found // T4-M7 = successful
Identities = recognized // Message recipients = found // T4-M7 = successful
Priority message = incoming...
Wrath. Darth Mortis of the Dark Council. Many have trembled before your might, but none more deserving than the menace we now face.
Dark Lord. This is Darth Mortis. Of all the Dark Council, you are best suited to handle a matter this perplexing--and this urgent.
Hunter. This is Darth Mortis of the Dark Council. You have served the Empire's interests well in the past. Serve us now.
Commander. This is Darth Mortis of the Dark Council. We have a situation where your particular set of skills would be especially useful.
This is Darth Mortis of the Dark Council. A dire situation has arisen; one which requires your unique talents.
This is Darth Mortis of the Dark Council. A crisis-level situation requiring your combined talents has come before me.
A long-absent fugitive from justice has recently resurfaced. He's been at the top of my list for ages. Now he threatens to cripple us.
I'll do worse than cripple this cretin, whoever he is.
Threats don't rattle me.
That's just the attitude I was hoping for. You do live up to your namesake.
No one runs from the Empire forever, no matter how sly. This "fugitive" will not slip through my fingers.
He is a fool.
Yes, of that I have little doubt.
Hope you've got plenty of credits, Mortis. I don't come cheap.
Fugitive equals bounty.
I pay my debts, bounty hunter. Always.
To elude the Empire's grasp for long, you have to be pretty good. I'm better.
Sounds like a challenge.
Here is the perfect opportunity to prove yourself right.
Does this mystery person have a name? Could be someone I know.
Anyone I've heard of?
Possible, though I doubt it. He has been away a very long time.
The Empire's messes aren't automatically my messes, you know.
Not my problem.
Potentially losing the Empire as a client altogether would not be terribly good for business.
As you say, he's on your list--not mine. Why am I being dragged into this?
This sounds like your problem.
If he isn't stopped, it may very well spell the end of the Empire. I presume that meets your criteria.
You'll speak with my source; she worked directly under this agitator. Her knowledge is vital if we're to uncover the nature of this plot against us.
She also has an ingenious little device for you. Go to her now. Time is of the essence.
T4-M7 = in awe // You = impressive
